2012-02-07

BtVS: Lovers Walk - So, Cordelia's gonna be okay?

Oh yeah Whedon - that fake Cordy funeral was just mean, not shocking... and, as this wasn't my first time, knowing that it was fake just made it seem more vulgar - it lacked any subtlety or care it was just a pointlessly brutal gut-punch. Don't do that again (we wish).
